format: JavaScript (likely JSX/JavaScript with Lightning JS framework)
description: This is a source file defining a 'NoteEditor' component using the Lightning JS framework. It manages the UI for editing notes, including title, body, and delete functionality, along with autosave features.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A Lightning JS component for editing and displaying notes, including title, body, and delete options.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Asynchronously saves the current note or updates it using the dataProvider, with error handling to show a toast message on failure.

methods.name: _setTitle
methods.description: Sets the note's title in the UI and optionally saves the change.

methods.name: _setBody
methods.description: Sets the note's body content in the UI and optionally saves the change.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes event handlers, specifically for the delete button.

methods.name: onBackspace
methods.description: Handles backspace key to delete characters from the current focus field.

methods.name: onEnter
methods.description: Adds a newline to the body when Enter is pressed in 'body' focus.

methods.name: onKey
methods.description: Handles character key presses to update the title or body based on current focus.
